definitions.definition: The act or method of controlling or directing

definitions.example: Good conduct will be rewarded and likewise poor conduct will be punished.

definitions.definition: Convoy; escort; person who accompanies another
Something which carries or conveys anything; a channel; an instrument.
To lead, or guide; to escort.
To lead; to direct; to be in charge of (people or tasks)
definitions.example: The commander conducted thousands of troops.

definitions.definition: To serve as a medium for conveying; to transmit (heat, light, electricity, etc.)
To direct, as the leader in the performance of a musical composition.
To act as a conductor (as of heat, electricity, etc.); to carry.
